DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy MediTate Temporary Implantable Nitinol Device ( TIND ) use alleviate symptom Bladder Outlet Obstruction ( BOO ) secondary Benign Prostate Hyperplasia ( BPH ) .The TIND inserted bladder neck prostatic urethra local anesthesia day take 5 day later doctor office .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Safety & Efficacy MediTate Temporary Implant Subjects With Benign Prostate Hyperplasia
DOC.criteria: Main IC : Subject sign informed consent prior performance study procedure . Male BPH , least 50 year age diagnose BOO . IPSS symptom severity score â‰¥ 10 . Peak urinary flow < 12 ml/sec No pathology find kidney US Prostatic urethra length < 30 mm Prostate volume < 35 cc Normal Urinalysis urine culture . Main EC : Any prior prostate treatment Suspected prove carcinoma prostate Urethral stricture Urinary bladder stone Serum prostate specific antigen level > 4 ng/ml ( unless prove carcinoma free biopsy ) . Active urinary tract infection determine positive culture , bacterial prostatitis within past year document positive culture . Median prostatic lobe enlargement prominent obstruct `` ball valve '' prostatic lobe . Subject interest future fertility willing undergo fertility treatment whatsoever .
